definition: variant of 辭令|辞令[ci2 ling4]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: Do you like working with figures more than words?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡與數據還是詞令打交道？

sentences.english: The words by the right to the role transformation from the language appropriate to the occasion, dredge relational.
sentences.chinese: 話語由權利向詞令，疏通關係的角色轉變。

sentences.english: Do not let flattery throw you off your guard against an enemy.
sentences.chinese: 別讓恭維之詞令你放鬆了對敵人的警戒。
